thought.text: Let me check if CompoundModel has its own implementation:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmp7elrhwgm/astropy && grep -n -A 10 -B 5 "_calculate_separability_matrix" astropy/modeling/core.py | grep -A 15 -B 5 "class CompoundModel" || echo "Not found in CompoundModel"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmp7elrhwgm/astropy && grep -n -A 10 -B 5 \"_calculate_separability_matrix\" astropy/modeling/core.py | grep -A 15 -B 5 \"class CompoundModel\" || echo \"Not found in CompoundModel\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
